index.title: Myanmar Institutions
index.content:
Subnational Institution-Building in Post-2021 Myanmar
This resource documents evolving understanding of subnational institution-building in post-2021 coup Myanmar.
What This Is
A living document tracking the emergence of federal and confederal structures, with emphasis on:

Institutions intended to scaffold a future federal or confederal democracy
“Intermediate institutions” explicitly designed as temporary structures
The nested, hierarchical relationships between union-level and subnational entities
The political economy of minorities-within-minorities at subnational levels


This site is under development. Content coming soon.
